description:
GREAT LOCATION! Studio apartment perfect for a couple or single guest.  Trendy restaurants and bars across the street and walking distance to Central Park and 5th Avenue. Whole Foods 2 blocks away.  Internet. Free Phone- In the US. Linens and towels provided.  Full kitchen and Fridge.  From apartment to location- the best way to experience NYC!

Superb location

Restaurants, bars, Starbucks, Wholefoods, Bed Bath and Beyond, Central Park, 5th Ave stores

Close to everything you need- shopping- restaurants- coffee shops, bagel shops- Starbucks- Dunkin' Donuts-wholefoods- yoga and gym studios- Central Park- 5th avenue

Close to all public transportation. Bus stop across the steet/ train only a few blocks away
name: Cozy Manhattan Studio
review: The host canceled this reservation 32 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
